mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pmReservation(prCode, pmCode, prUsingDate, prPersonnel, prUserCount, prAddUserName, prAddUserCount, prAddUserPersonnel, prbasicPrice, prAddPrice, prTotalPrice) VALUES(#{prCode}, #{pmCode}, #{prUsingDate}, #{prPersonnel}, #{prUserCount}, #{prAddUserName}, #{prAddUserCount}, #{prAddUserPersonnel}, #{prbasicPrice}, #{prAddPrice}, #{prTotalPrice})
